itemDescription: British locomotive engineer and designer of the LMS Ivatt Class 2 2-6-2T’s and Ivatt Class 2 2-6-0’s,Ivatt Class 4 2-6-0’s, and designer of the Caprotti Black 5 4-6-0’s and designer of LMS 1000 and 1001 Diesel Locomotives (First Maine Line Diesel)

wikipedia_page.main: Henry George Ivatt (4 May 1886 – 4 October 1972), known as George Ivatt, was the post-war Chief Mechanical Engineer of the London Midland and Scottish Railway. He was the son of the Great Northern Railway locomotive engineer Henry Ivatt. George Ivatt was born in Dublin, Ireland, and educated at Uppingham School, England.
